messages: 4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:31): dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb, 56ef338f9fcf9452fc833a005325025e - you guys want to publish Widget URI? http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/public-webapps/2011JulSep/0984.html
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:31): is that a new WD or LC?
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:33): It looks to me like there are still some open actions for this spec http://www.w3.org/2008/webapps/track/products/8
dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb (17:33): Will move it to LC in parallel with File API
dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb (17:33): (they both use the same fake HTTP-response model)
dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb (17:34): After publishing, I can do http://www.w3.org/2008/webapps/track/actions/282
dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb (17:35): I might even be able to do that before next week
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (17:35): ACTION-549 -- Robin Berjon to uRI scheme spec: add the requirement(s) this spec addresses e.g. R36 "Resolve Addressing Scheme" -- due 2010-05-19 -- OPEN
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (17:35): ACTION-551 -- Robin Berjon to add requirements to Widget URIs based on what's in the requirements document -- due 2010-05-27 -- OPEN
dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb (17:36): That's what I want to republish

22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (17:36): ACTION-578 -- Robin Berjon to widget URI scheme: define the semantics of a widget using "widget:" e.g. <a href="widget:/foo.html">next</a> -- due 2010-09-15 -- OPEN
56ef338f9fcf9452fc833a005325025e (17:36): I believe I've done all the requirements actions
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:37): ok, so fix them both then ;-)
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:38): 56ef338f9fcf9452fc833a005325025e, marcos - what's the status of comments from the URI list and the IETF folks?
dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb (17:38): I'll restart the discussion once it's stable
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:39): can you prepare a version for WD publication on Sep 8?
dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb (17:40): but it might be too soon for the W3C guys
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:40): or do you need more time?
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:40): let's try it and worse case is Sep 13 pub
dfefdb66581190514404f57cdf74a8eb (17:40): Next tuesday would be a safer bet
4dd217ba7542bb00a127f682e2c3ad27 (17:40): ok; then ping me when it is Pub-ready
